name: Platform Battles
description:
CURRENTLY NOT VERY PLAYABLE ON BROWSER, please download to currently play. I'll fix the issue when I have some time. Thanks for playing!

Mouse to turn, WSAD to move and jump with space bar.

The jump will always push forward and once pressed the longer you hold it the more air time you. 

Get to the old man for a boss battle!

Currently in development and made for the 2 day GameJam
